I absolutely love the ZESICA Women's Summer Mini Dress!  What I Liked: The dress has the perfect length and strikes a great balance between simple and elegant. It’s incredibly comfortable and fits true to size, which is always a plus. I especially love the unique tie shoulder detail—it adds a fun touch! The color looks amazing with a summer tan, making it a great choice for sunny days. Plus, it’s versatile enough to wear for multiple occasions; you can easily dress it up with accessories or keep it casual for a day out.  What I Disliked: Honestly, I can’t think of any major downsides. The only thing to note is that the ruffle tier can add a bit of volume, so it might not suit everyone’s style.  Overall, I highly recommend this dress for anyone looking for a stylish and comfortable option!

Wanted a basic, but cute, black dress for errands and every day wear. This dress seemed perfect. Unfortunately, it’s strange. The chest doesn’t lay right and gaps open in awkward spots. I have tried turning it around and wearing it both ways, tying and re-tying the shoulders to fit different, nothing makes it work. I wear a 36D and I’m wondering if a smaller chested woman would have better luck with the fit. Sometimes bigger isn’t better 😂 The fabric is good, nice that there’s a lining, and feels quality. Just beware if you have a bosom, this probably isn’t the dress for you.

Very comfortable and great for warmer weather. I think it’s very flattering and a nice length. 5’ 5” 140lbs in the small.

Very fun, cute, comfortable little sun dress. Thin soft fabric. Ties at the shoulder for better fit. Lightweight so great for hot days. Easy to wash and can be dried without much or any shrinking at all. Great quality and value. One of my favorites.

评论概述: Cute for a summer cover up
评论详情: This dress wrinkles very easily but it is great to use as a cover up or for just throwing on to lounge around the backyard.  The shoulder ties allow you to adjust to suit your needs.  Overall it is a really cute little dress and it could be worn to casual gatherings, just know that it will wrinkle easily.

I am using mine as a swimsuit coverup. Color is listed as Apricot, though it is more of a cream. Top portion is lined to prevent show-through. Straps come untied so that can be adjusted depending on your chest size. I tossed mine in the dryer on refresh and it came out wrinkle-free. Could be worn as a dress with a strapless/tube style bra. Very nice for the price and not at all sheer.
Fit perfect and washes well
This dress is really cute, nice and soft material. It is a little longer than I expected and fits a little bigger but it is really cute. It will work great for summer time. I like it.
Very cute and versatile. I like that it has pockets very handy.  Fits true to size. Perfect for summer.
Too big

This dress survived a full day at Disney World and kept me relatively cool despite how hot and humid it was outside. I feel like that's good enough of a review but I'll list out more reasons I love this dress:  Pros: - Lightweight and perfect for hot days - Can dress this up or down depending on occasion - Straps are thick enough and back is high enough that you can wear a normal bra without it showing - it's cute - quality is great. Again, it held up to Disney World and multiple wearings afterwards  Cons: - Some people have mentioned the straps but like.... tie them before you put the dress on, its not that hard - I think it ran a little big but as it's meant to be flowy, it's not really a bad thing - yes it wrinkles but it's viscose and if you let it sit in the dryer a day after it's done drying, of course it's going to wrinkle - It's currently $41 which I think is a bit high but since it's viscose and not polyester, that's forgivable  I'm going to hope the price drops a bit and when it does, I'll be getting another one

Had such high hopes for this dress but unfortunately it just fell short. Ordered a small, and the small seems big and boxy. It just doesn't give a flattering look. The ties at top are big and kind of awkward. Im 5'6 and it juat makes me seem boxy and short. After washing, it seems to of dried a bit lopsided and seems shorter on one side now:/ The fabric, however,  is super soft! It made of a bit thicker material so it does seem like it'll be a bit warmer of a dress for summer. Value for the money just seems to fall a bit short on this dress.

I ordered this dress hoping to wear it in the summer and it does't disappoint.  I like that the shoulders can be tied, making them easy to adjust to my measurements.  The length of the dress is also flattering on my 5'2" frame, when a lot of other summer dresses hang well below the knee.  The only slight issue I have is in the cups of the bust; the material isn't very forgiving, so it's slightly tighter than I would like, but still wearable.  Anyone with a very busty shape might find this dress difficult to wear.

This is the perfect summer dress. Cute and classy and not skin tight. I love that you can dress it up with wedges or dress it down with flats. The material is comfortable and breathable. No shrinking in the laundry. Sizing is on point.

This is a nice quality dress and so cute! I may sew the straps at the shoulder so that the bow is more decorative than functional and I don't have to worry about it coming undone while I'm wearing the dress. The color is beautiful. It's a flattering style, but I personally want a tad more length. That said, the length is probably fine for most people. The fabric gets wrinkly, which isn't usually something I go for because I HATE ironing, but it's ok.

I like this coverall dress. It is well-made and cute but the shoulder ties are awkward. They aren't sewn in place which is good for adjusting it accordingly if need be but I found it bothersome to get both sides tied up evenly. It just makes wearing it a hassle. The best bet is to get it tied the way you like it and then never untie it again!

It can be difficult to order clothing online, but this dress is a definite win! It is very lightweight and probably won't hold up to a lot of wear, but it looks nice and fits well. I ordered it in apricot, which ends up being a perfect spring color. The bows on the shoulders are a unique touch that makes this really stand out. For nice, casual wear, this dress is a gem. Hopefully it will last a long time.

I got this in green in the size large. It looks just like the photos and fits true to the included size chart. This is a beautiful dress and it's very well made. There are no loose threads, the seams are solid, and it's VERY comfy. The fabric feels soft on the skin and drapes well and the shoulders tie for some adjustability and visual interest. This dress would work for a variety of occasions and can easily be dressed up or down. Overall, I'm very pleased with it!

This dress is really cute and comfy. Perfect for the Spring/Summer season. The fit is great, I don’t even need shape wear. Especially, since the dress is lined. The straps are a little tricky, that’s why I gave it a 4 out of 5. It’s not flattering in the breast area, if I don’t tie them in a certain way. Overall, a great, breezy look.
